properties.name: baseSize
properties.description: Specifies the base size of an item element along the main direction.

properties.name: box
properties.description: Holds a [Box configuration object] for the item.

properties.name: ratio
properties.description: Specifies the ratio value used to count the item element size along the main direction.

properties.name: shrink
properties.description: A factor that defines how much an item shrinks relative to the rest of the items in the container.
